definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 15:16 treasure, store, treasury, storehouse (so Aram., also 0aws.ro0)—[[אוֹחָר]] Pr 15:16 +; cstr. [[אוֹחַר]] Jos 6:19 +; sf. [[אוֹחָרוֹ]] De 28:12 + 2 t.; pl. [[אוֹחָרוֹת]] Joe 1:17 +; [[אׂחָרוֹת]] Pr 21:6 +; cstr. [[אוֹחְרוֹת]] Mic 6:10 +; [[אׂחְרוֹת]] Job 38:22 +; pl. sf. :[[אוֹחְרׂתָֽי]] De 32:34, Is 39:4; :[[אׂחְרׂתָֽי]] De 32:34; [[אוֹחְרוֹתֶיךָ]] Je 17:3; [[אוֹחְרׂתָם]] Is 30:6; [[אׂחְרׂתֵיהֶם]] Pr 8:21, etc.—

treasure(s), gen. pl. (gold, silver, costly utensils, etc.) Jos 6:19, Jos 6:24, Is 2:7, Is 30:6, Is 45:3 ([[חשֶׁח]] ´[[א]], i.e. concealed, hoarded) Ho 13:15, Je 15:13, Je 17:3, Je 20:5, Je 48:7, Je 49:4, Je 51:13, 1Ki 14:26, 1Ki 14:26, 2Ki 24:13, 2Ki 24:13, perh. also Is 39:2, Is 39:4 = 2Ki 20:13, 2Ki 20:15; wealth Pr 15:16, Pr 21:6, Pr 21:20; gathered for temple-building (sg.) ´[[בֵּית י]] ´[[א]] 1Ch 29:8, [[הַמְּלָאכָה]] ´[[א]] Ezr 2:69 = Ne 7:70, also v:Ne 7:69 (cf. 1Ch 26:27).
store, supply of food, drink, etc., 2Ch 11:11, 1Ch 27:27, 1Ch 27:28; fig. [[רֶשַׁע]] ´[[א]] Mic 6:10, Pr 10:2; [[הִיא אוֹחָרוֹ]] ´[[יִרְאַת י]] Is 33:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: magazine of weapons, fig. of Yahweh's armoury Je 50:25;

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: storehouses of God for rain, snow, hail, wind, sea De 28:12, Job 38:22, Job 38:22, Je 10:13, Je 51:16, Ps 135:7, Ps 33:7.
